Woodpecker Cold Email - Pricing - Start small & grow with us
===============
                                    

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features, and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising, and analytics partners, who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

Customize Allow

Details ![Image 13: Close](https://cdn-cookieyes.com/assets/images/close.svg)

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.  
  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.  
  
This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.  
  
You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.  
  
Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our [Privacy Policy](https://woodpecker.co/privacy-policy/).  
  
Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.

NecessaryAlways Active

Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.

FAQ
---

*   ### Is there a free trial? How does the trial work?
    
    Yes, there is a free trial for 7-day or 50 contacted prospects. Whichever limit you reach first applies. You start the trial when you create an account in Woodpecker. During the trial, you have access to all Woodpecker features. You can also contact 50 prospects for free during the trial to test Woodpecker.
    
*   ### What happens when the trial ends? Can I extend my trial?
    
    Yes, you can extend your trial if you need more time. You also keep your access to Woodpecker after your trial ends. You can extend your trial by writing to us via the chat in the bottom right corner of the screen.
    
*   ### Do you automatically upgrade to a higher plan when reaching the limits of the current plan?
    
    No, your plan will not be automatically upgraded. You can upgrade the plan by yourself if you'd like that.
    
*   ### What happens if I exceed the limits in my plan? (contacted or stored prospects)
    
    If you exceed the limit of "contacted prospects", the campaign won't send new emails to new prospects.  
    To contact new prospects you can upgrade to a higher limit or wait until the limit renews on your billing date.  
      
    "Stored prospects" is a metric that doesn't renew. If you exceed the stored prospects limit, you won't be able to add new prospects to your database and campaigns. To add new prospects you can either upgrade or remove prospects from the database.
    
*   ### What happens to the plan limits if I add the same prospect in 5 different campaigns?
    
    It counts as 1 prospect in your "stored prospects" limit. It counts as 5 in your "contacted prospects".

FAQ
---

*   ### Is there a free trial? How does the trial work?
    
    Yes, there is a free trial for 7-day or 50 contacted prospects. Whichever limit you reach first applies. You start the trial when you create an account in Woodpecker. During the trial, you have access to all Woodpecker features. You can also contact 50 prospects for free during the trial to test Woodpecker.
    
*   ### What happens when the trial ends? Can I extend my trial?
    
    Yes, you can extend your trial if you need more time. You also keep your access to Woodpecker after your trial ends. You can extend your trial by writing to us via the chat in the bottom right corner of the screen.
    
*   ### Do you automatically upgrade to a higher plan when reaching the limits of the current plan?
    
    No, your plan will not be automatically upgraded. You can upgrade the plan by yourself if you'd like that.
    
*   ### What happens if I exceed the limits in my plan? (contacted or stored prospects)
    
    If you exceed the limit of "contacted prospects", the campaign won't send new emails to new prospects.  
    To contact new prospects you can upgrade to a higher limit or wait until the limit renews on your billing date.  
      
    "Stored prospects" is a metric that doesn't renew. If you exceed the stored prospects limit, you won't be able to add new prospects to your database and campaigns. To add new prospects you can either upgrade or remove prospects from the database.
    
*   ### What happens to the plan limits if I add the same prospect in 5 different campaigns?
    
    It counts as 1 prospect in your "stored prospects" limit. It counts as 5 in your "contacted prospects".
